[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/set-webpack-public-path-plugin](./set-webpack-public-path-plugin.md) &gt; [ISetWebpackPublicPathOptions](./set-webpack-public-path-plugin.isetwebpackpublicpathoptions.md) &gt; [getPostProcessScript](./set-webpack-public-path-plugin.isetwebpackpublicpathoptions.getpostprocessscript.md)

## ISetWebpackPublicPathOptions.getPostProcessScript property

A function that returns a snippet of code that manipulates the variable with the name that's specified in the parameter. If this parameter isn't provided, no post-processing code is included. The variable must be modified in-place - the processed value should not be returned.

See the README for more information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPostProcessScript?: (varName: string) => string;
```
